entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
